lines.text: This is Mike Connors reminding you to keep those doors and windows locked!

[as serial killer Dwayne Gary Steckler meeting his double - inept reality show actor Wynn Dalton]
You know, Wynn... all my life I've been so careful. No photographs, no fingerprints. Nada. Then you come along. My clone. And suddenly I'm doing Dr. Richard Kimble out there! I can't make a friggin' move without 20 million stool pigeons running to their phones and saying, "Mike Connors? I just saw Steckler buying a Happy Meal." Well, I'm tired of running, Wynn. I want a place like this. A life like your's. And Dwayne Gary Steckler always gets what he wants!
